sn35.162:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā koṭṭhiko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.162:1.2: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.162:2.1: “Yaṃ kho, koṭṭhika, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.3: Cakkhu kho, koṭṭhika, aniccaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.4: Rūpā aniccā; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.5: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.6: Cakkhusamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.7: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35.162:2.8: jivhā aniccā; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.9: Rasā aniccā; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.10: Jivhāviññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.11: Jivhāsamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.12: Yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35.162:2.13: mano anicco; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.14: Dhammā aniccā; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.15: Manoviññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.16: Manosamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.17: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:2.18: Yaṃ kho, koṭṭhika, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
